Welcome to the Faber College Student Scheduler Enter Username Here Enter Password Here Clear Login Empty Username or Password Incorrect Username or Password
On this screen you can view all the terms that are available to you. Add term to schedule Help with term screen On this screen you will be able to create a new term by clicking the plus button icon on the toolbar. Click on a term to get a detailed view of the term which includes the courses with each term. Clicking the three dots will bring up options that are associated with each term. You will have three available options 1) Delete the term 2) Update the term\'s info. 3) View the term details. This option will bring you to a screen that will ist all the courses that are assigned to that term.
The term must be empty in order to delete it. Please select the Term Details option to remove the courses from the term. Term was deleted!>
Add a course to the schedule Help with course screen. Click on a course\'s three button icon to get the following options: 1) Delete a Course 2) Update the course 3) View Course details - get a detailed view of the course which includes the assessments with each course. 4) Add course notification
Course Title On this screen you can view all the courses that are available to you. Course Status
Add a course to the schedule Help with course screen. Assessment Title On this screen you will be able to create a new assessment by clicking the plus button icon on the toolbar. Click on a assessment\'s three dots to get the following options: 1) Delete an assessment 2) Update an assessment 3) Add course notification
On this screen you can view all the assessments that are available to you.
Start Date: End Date:
On this screen you will be able to create a new term or modify an existing term\'s information. You will need to fill out the appropriate information. There will be a date picker to simplify adding the start and end date. (Note you may need to tap the text field twice to bring up the date picker.) To save the new term click the diskette icon.
Enter the term information below. Enter term title: Click here to select start date.(You may need to double click) Click here to select end date.(You may need to double click) Edit Term Information
Term Title: Term Start Date: Term End Date: On this screen you will be able to view details about the term. You will see the term information as well as the courses that are associated with it. \n To add a course click the plus icon located next to help icon. Click on the card to see the following options: 1) View course details - will give you information about the selected 2) Update the course - update the course information. 3) Add course notification
View Course Details Update a Course Add Course Notification
Enter the course information below. Enter course title: Term Status On this screen you will be able to create a new course. You will need to fill out the appropriate information There will be a date picker to simplify adding the start and end date as well as a spinner for terms and . To save the new term click the diskette icon. Also, you will be able to add a notification for the course by clicking the calendar icon.
Click here to select start date. Click here to select end date.

Type of Assessment: On this screen you will be able to create or modify an assessment by clicking the plus button icon on the toolbar.
Add An Assessment Update An Assessment
Note Title: Enter Note Title here: Enter Note body here: Enter Note below: On this screen you will be able to create a new or modify/update after entering the appropriate information note by clicking the diskette button.
Add Note Screen Update Note Screen View notes only
This screen will allow you to view information about the selected course. \n You will be able to add assessments and notes by clicking the menu options - the three dots top right of the screen. The cards in a darker shade of blue will be the assessments. The cards in the lighter blue will be the notes for the selected course. \n If you choose the three dots on the assessment you will have the following options: 1) Delete the assessment 2) Update the information for the assessment. 3) Add a notification for the assessment. \n If you choose the notes (by selecting the folded page icon) you will be presented with the following options: 1) Delete the note 2) Update the note 3) View note details - choosing this option you will only be able to view the note and note make any changes to the note details. 4) Share note - you will be able to share the note via email or other options.
Course Details Add an assessment Add a note Add an assessment or note by clicking below.
